html:
Thus saith the LORD. See App-82.

The heaven, &c. Quoted inActs 7:49 . Compare1 Kings 8:27. 2 Chronicles 6:18 .

the = this. Hebrew. zeh .

ye: i.e. the future builders of the house.

the place of My rest: i.e. rest in satisfaction. The Temple was for sacrifice and atonement (2 Chronicles 2:6), not for dwelling. CompareActs 7:48 .
